name: 2. Meta Ads System - 1b. Import Scraped Ads to Generated Ads

parameters.content:
## Trigger on Airtable tickbox
This is used instead of a button because we want to enable multiple to be imported in one event

## Add to Generated Ads Table
Ready for processing

parameters.text:
You have two very clear tasks:
1. Transcribe this video. Spoken words only. Output it inside a JSON object named "transcript". Don't use timestamps. Output as a single text.

2. Describe what is happening in this video so a person can understand the context. Output it inside a JSON object named "description". Don't use timestamps. Be concise. Output as a single text.

parameters.content:
Gemini 2.5 Pro is great for transcriptions.

Accurate, affordable and big token output for longer videos.

There are cheaper alternatives, like [DeepGram](https://deepgram.com/), if you'd like to optimize costs.

parameters.text: Extract the text from this image. Output only the extracted text; nothing more.
What's in this image? Describe it in detail. Ignore any text that's in the image. Output only the description text, nothing more.
Extract the text from this image. Output only the extracted text; nothing more.
What's in this image? Describe it in detail. Ignore any text that's in the image. Output only the description text, nothing more.
